# [Interview #186: USA Today Interview, Entry #51](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=186#51)

#### Monticello, Indiana

What's the most amusing and/or bizarre question a fan has ever asked you?

#### Robert Jordan

Well, I've had a couple young women ask if they could bear my child. That's not the usual kind of question I getâ€”that sort of took me aback, yes.
